


## 1. Submitting New Controlled Vocabularies

The following forms are available for this repository, and can be used to add or modify entries. The complete submission pipeline (if applicable) will be outlined in the section above.


### New CMIP7 Permissable Value

- [activity](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=activity.yml)
- [frequency](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=frequency.yml)
- [realm](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=realm.yml)
- [source_type](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=source_type.yml)
- [native_nominal_resolution](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=native_nominal_resolution.yml)
- [region](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=region.yml)
### Issues & Discussion

- [discussion](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=discussion.yml)
- [general_issue](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=general_issue.yml)
### Experiments

- [experiment](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=experiment.yml)
### Models & Sources

### Ungrouped Forms

- [source](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/CMIP7-CVs/issues/new?template=source.yml)
